poem:
***Ode to a Recipe***

This morning's news,
no politics, no disaster,
just the simplicity
of sweet potatoes,
chunked and roasted,
baptized in brown sugar,
peanuts scattering
like thoughts,
a dish that is not
just one thing,
like the way a poem
begins as an idea
and ends as a feast.
